name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Additional information: 
The police kicked the people and then dragged them away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplement: On the evening of January 5, people gathered at Pucheng Vocational School to seek justice for the student who fell from the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, it was reported that the logistics director of a primary school in Jilin embezzled student meal fees, taking 0.3 yuan in kickbacks for every 12 yuan of student meal fees, accumulating 1 yuan at a time, and embezzled 230,000 yuan in more than nine years.
As a result, netizens believed that this director was an honest official, who only embezzled 230,000 yuan in nine years: "I actually thought he was an honest official"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 5, Tangshan, Hebei. A retired soldier was delivering water outdoors. On the way, he met a traffic policeman who asked him to unload a bottle of water from his car and move it to the guardhouse.
After the veteran did so, he asked the traffic policeman: "Are you paying money or water tickets?"
Traffic policeman: "We have never paid for drinking water"
After the veteran was told that it was not free, the traffic policeman threatened: "I was going to fine you, but I won't fine you today"
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6 (Released) The mother of Dang Changxin, a student who fell from a building at Pucheng Vocational School, spoke out: Thank you for your concern and support. The relevant departments have intervened and are in communication. "I hope everyone will not believe the rumors and gather at the school. Please leave a quiet place for my child and the school." The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 5, Tongzi County, Guizhou. A wooden door factory operator posted a video saying that he prepared several red envelopes to deal with the inspection by the leaders.
In the video, he pointed to the red envelopes on the table and said: "This red envelope is 3,000, this one is also 3,000, this red envelope is smaller"
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Local netizens said: "The child's mother compromised" "The child's mother posted a TikTok and compromised for 2 million"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The internet exposed the traffic control on the Weinan Expressway in Shaanxi.
At 12 o'clock in the morning, there were still people gathering near the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Large-scale conflicts between police and citizens in recent years:
November 23, 2022, Zhengzhou, Henan, Foxconn riot 2.0
August 23, 2023, Bazhou, Hebei, flood victims defended their rights against the municipal government
December 28, 2023, death of a teenager at Yuhuayuan School in Ningling County, Henan Province
January 6, 2025, Pucheng, Shaanxi, 17-year-old boy fell to his death

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 27, 2023, Hua County, Anyang, Henan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 24, 2024, Jinan, Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, Australia A children's clothing store operated by a Chinese was fined 5.15 million Australian dollars, about 23.5 million RMB, for exploiting 4 Chinese immigrants and obstructing the Labor Department's investigation. The shareholders were also fined 800,000 dollars (shareholders cannot go bankrupt like companies to evade debts). They also need to make up 130,000 dollars for underpayment of wages. The company operates several children's clothing stores in Sydney and the capital. The main crime is that the hourly wage is as low as 10 Australian dollars, while the legal minimum of 24 dollars is about 110 RMB.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is worth noting that while the people of Pucheng were bravely confronting the police, the incident of Lu Han giving the middle finger that was on Weibo's hot search headlines actually happened in November.
Lu Han did not receive any punishment for more than a month after that live broadcast, until he suddenly became a hot search on Weibo yesterday and was punished by being banned from broadcasting for half a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 7, when searching for the site of the conflict between police and civilians at Pucheng Vocational Education Center on Douyin, only two videos were left after filtering videos from Pucheng and the huge city of Weinan within one day.
When searching for Dali County, which is also under the jurisdiction of Weinan City, there were many local videos posted within one day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, the 2025 Shanghai Spring College Entrance Examination English Listening and Speaking Test (Shanghai College Entrance Examination English is held twice a year in January and June, and the higher one is taken as the final score). The difficulty of the morning and afternoon computer-based listening tests is inconsistent. The morning session is obviously more difficult than the afternoon session, but the scoring mode is the same, which caused dissatisfaction among students.
It is reported that there are four sets of papers in this Shanghai English Spring Examination, and the difficulty of different papers varies greatly.
Some students complained about this matter to the 12345 Mayor Hotline

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Douyin Vice President Li Liang once again refuted the rumor that Douyin censors sensitive words. He stated that Douyin will not simply limit the use of sensitive words, but may limit the use of "extreme words" in the promotion of goods in violation of the Advertising Law or in the case of explaining finance without qualifications.
Netizens in the comment area expressed their disbelief and shared their own experiences: For example, in the video, you can't even mention China, you can only replace it with words such as Dongda and Longguo, otherwise it will be censored.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Case study from the second episode of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection propaganda film "Anti-corruption for the People":
Zhou Xianming, a contractor with a technical secondary school education, claimed at various dinner parties that he was a disciple of a certain master of Chinese studies and knew senior leaders, and often showed off some so-called "inside information". Several senior leaders of PetroChina believed him without a doubt.
He won several projects from the assistant general manager and deputy general manager of PetroChina by promising to ask leaders for help in promotion, with a total value of more than 300 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Cases from the second episode of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection propaganda film "Anti-corruption for the People": 
Police officers at the Vehicle Administration Office colluded with each other and cooperated with scalpers to collect money, collected money to jump the queue at the review post, collected money to pass the review at the inspection post, collected money to handle the case at the acceptance post, and collected money to speed up the processing at the file post...
In the case of multiple civilian (auxiliary) police officers at the Vehicle Administration Office in Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province, who violated the interests of the masses, public officials at the Vehicle Administration Office colluded with vehicle inspection companies and motor vehicle agents inside and outside, set up checkpoints at all levels, and collected bribes
Du Juanmin, a former police officer at the inspection post, had the largest amount of personal corruption. He could get two to three thousand yuan for each illegal truck he let go, and received bribes of 1.654 million yuan in 4 years. Every Friday, many car agents lined up outside his office to give money. If the money was not in place, they would be constantly harassed. Zhang Guotao, a former auxiliary police officer at the Vehicle Administration Office, received WeChat red envelopes ranging from ten to dozens of yuan for a file, and the total amount over the years was as high as more than 470,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some grassroots civil servants in towns and villages posted a post complaining that they have no weekends at all. The weekends are often cancelled for various reasons, such as medical insurance collection, forest fire prevention, high-quality development projects in hundreds of thousands of villages, and living environment. They are even required to do such work as cleaning up sanitary dead corners and dilapidated mud brick houses in towns and villages. Grassroots netizens complained: Village medical insurance collection rate is not 95%, and they have to work overtime. In some places, they are forced to subscribe to newspapers at their own expense.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Three pictures from the Pucheng incident in Shaanxi:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Lu Jian, a teacher at Jiangsu University School of Medicine, exposed the false rumors of Jiangsu University under his real name. He revealed that a large number of teachers at the university had resigned in the past two years, and the personnel department had suppressed their approval, which eventually led to a physical conflict between the director of the personnel department of the university and others.
Afterwards, his parents and wife were harassed and threatened by the university. He had no choice but to post a message for help: The university is not a gang, and this kind of constant harassment makes the school look like a gang organization!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 7, a magnitude 7.1 earthquake occurred in Dingri County, Tibet at 9:05 am. Houses collapsed at the epicenter and at least 9 people were killed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a teacher from Jiangsu University posted a post complaining that the university has begun to implement quantitative assessments for teachers, which is a tool to exploit ordinary teachers. The university deducts the workload of small classes in proportion, and the workload of classes with fewer students is calculated in half of 32 hours. Being an academic tutor, setting questions for admissions, grading papers, interviewing and defending are not counted as workload, and the workload requirements will increase every year. If the workload is not enough, the salary will be deducted. At present, more than 200 teachers in the school have applied for resignation, but the school does not approve it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, Jiangsu University posted a post to refute the rumor, saying that no more than 200 teachers had resigned in 24 years. However, Lu Jian, a teacher at the medical school of the university, slapped the school in the face by his real name: many teachers applied to resign, but the school did not approve the resignation, and the director of the personnel department had a physical conflict with others because of this matter. Afterwards, the school harassed and threatened Lu Jian's family like a gangster, forcing the teacher to post a post for help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the original picture of the death investigation conclusion of a 17-year-old student who fell to death without reason at Pucheng Vocational Education Center was circulated online. After on-site investigation and field visits, the investigation conclusions are: 
1. The person died from falling from a high altitude 
2. The person's death is not a criminal case

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, a car caught fire on the Shanghai North Cross-Island Corridor, with black smoke billowing from the scene.
Many media reports concealed the brand of the car that caught fire. Some netizens compared and found that the car was suspected to be a BYD Qin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of January 6, a Toyota Prado overspeeding hit several vehicles on Guangzhou Keyun Road. A total of 5 cars and 1 electric vehicle were involved in the accident. One of them was a BYD Han sedan that was split into two compartments, and the rear part was severely deformed.
The official report said: 4 people, including the electric vehicle driver, were slightly injured

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: In a residential area in Dadukou, Chongqing, the developer left the project unfinished and the houses were severely reduced in specifications, but the property management company still wanted to collect parking fees for the garage. The garage was full of cracks and leaked. If you don't pay the parking fee, the property management company called the police to help collect it by force, and directly arrested you if you don't pay. "The police have become the dogs of the developer."
It should be noted that it is illegal for the police to intervene in civil economic disputes in China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The victimized depositors of Henan Village Bank submitted an article: For more than half a month, no one has answered the phone calls of the six departments of Henan Qinyang Court. The Henan Court did not hesitate to paralyze the telephone contact system and resolutely prevented the public from attending the trial of the case of Henan Village Bank depositors Ouyang Yun and Shi Jianjian who were provoked by provocation when they asked for their deposits. What's funny is that on December 26, 24, the Supreme Court just held a press conference, emphasizing that it must resolutely put an end to irregular phenomena such as preventing the public from attending the trial in disguise.
Depositors asked the global public to help continue to make calls and watch how long the Henan Court can pull the phone line? What law did the depositors break when they went to Henan to ask for their deposits?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 7, the National Development and Reform Commission issued the "Guidelines for the Construction of a National Unified Market"
It is necessary to establish and improve a national unified employment and social security public service platform. Completely cancel the restrictions on household registration for insurance at the place of employment, and improve the transfer and continuation policy of social security relations. All regions shall not set policy barriers that affect the flow of talents in terms of household registration, region, identity, archives, personnel relations, etc.
Netizen comments: Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou should take the lead. Employment discrimination at the age of 35 should be rectified. Household registration should be abolished

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xianyang, Shaanxi. A slogan on the highway in Taicun Town reads "The interests of the Party come first"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the EU officially approved the EU Forced Labor Regulation, which explicitly prohibits the sale, import and export of goods made with forced labor in the EU market.
One netizen responded, "It's obvious that they don't want us to develop, and they just made up an excuse."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6 (Released) Liaoning. A woman posted a video to report that her husband Shao Jiapeng, a clerk in the Liaoning Procuratorate, had cheated on her and had a child with a third party. She has reported this to the relevant departments for more than a year but has not received a response yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 6, the comment section of CCTV News was in turmoil, with a large number of netizens posting comments in support of Li Yixue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that Pucheng County, Shaanxi Province requires students who have taken leave and are at home to stay at home and implement the three-day control policy; they are not allowed to speak out, post videos, comments, or like related content on online platforms; they are not allowed to connect or contact other students and social personnel to gather in the control area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Local residents in Pucheng County said that all intersections around the school were controlled; 
Other residents said that there were sentries at the entrances of each village and people were not allowed to come out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. Department of Defense has included 134 Chinese companies including Tencent, CATL, Qihoo 360, and BGI on the military blacklist. Tencent ADR fell nearly 10% at its lowest point after opening. Tencent said in a statement that its appearance on the list was "clearly a mistake." "We are not a military company or supplier."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Zhao Juan, a doctor at a pediatric hospital in Beijing, wrote that she had treated a 13-year-old girl who had not defecated for two weeks. The girl said that she could not defecate in time while living in the school dormitory. The break time in school was compressed. She had to go to bed on time at night. She had to ask for permission to defecate and there was a fixed time for defecation, so she could only defecate once when she went home on weekends.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Our community planning committee is open for recruitment. Netizens who are enthusiastic about community building are welcome to join and provide constructive suggestions.
Click on the original tweet or link to learn more about how to participate in the community planning committee

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on January 7, the National Development and Reform Commission: All regions shall not use administrative or criminal means to illegally interfere in economic disputes; they shall not illegally carry out law enforcement or implement management in other places.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Last year, medical giant Baxter informed Chinese distributors that the company would stop commercial operations of intravenous infusion products in the Chinese market. With the opening of the 10th batch of national drug centralized volume procurement, drugs that cost 3 cents per tablet have sparked heated discussions. At the same time, more and more foreign companies are abandoning the domestic market.
Netizens responded, "First extend the retirement period, then reduce the average life expectancy, and the government's pension financial problems will be solved" and "Life depends on fate"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/HhIKjnpXl4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6, Ankang, Shaanxi. Netizens revealed that Zijin Sand and Stone Co., Ltd. was quarrying sand and stone on a large scale in the Huanguzhenjiang section. On January 1, a crew member fell into the river, but the surveillance at the time of the incident showed that the river was calm and the company did not take any action, as if nothing had happened. Afterwards, the company did not report the incident to the local government and relevant departments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 6 (released) A user launched an online poll on Russia's "MKRU" website: "If NATO troops parachute into Moscow to surround the Kremlin, will you stand up to defend the Kremlin?"
 A total of 2,833 people participated in this vote, of which 4% chose to defend the Kremlin; 23% chose not to go; and 73% chose to help NATO.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 5, Zhengzhou, Henan. Bloggers interview passers-by on the street: "How do you feel about this year? Do you think next year will be better?"
Interviewee: "This year is not very good, business is too difficult, and next year will not be better than this year"
"I am a sanitation worker, and I am still four months in arrears with my salary for 23 years"
"I am very happy this year, I have a monthly pension of about 3,000 yuan, and next year will be better than this year"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, Shandong Provincial Hospital (Group) Ludong Hospital was exposed to use medical examination cards to deduct employees' wages due to poor sales. 
Employees said, "It wasted a month's salary, and some people received 60 or 70 medical examination cards to deduct their wages."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 7, Hu Xijin used the word "step down" to mock Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau.
A blogger said: Stepping down is indeed the inevitable fate of every Western leader. In this regard, Putin and Assad are different. As long as the knife is not put on their necks, they will not give up their determination to serve the people.
Currently, the post has been banned from being forwarded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was revealed online that the government of Lanxi County, Heilongjiang Province, issued a notice calling on cadres and employees of the county's party and government agencies, social groups, schools, troops, units, and state-owned and private enterprises to make voluntary donations. Individuals can donate one day's salary, and units can donate one day's office expenses. The whistleblower said, "Donations are mandatory, and after donating, you have to upload a remittance slip."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, many schools in Pucheng County have issued notices that there will be no winter vacation, and students will continue to stay in school for classes.
Local netizens responded, "Why not take a vacation? What are you afraid of?" "Hit the snake at its weakest point. With the child in hand, you can leave whenever you want."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 5, Zhoushan, Zhejiang. Fully armed special police practiced handling explosives on site.
Netizens said in the comment section: "Who are they guarding against?" "Who is the enemy?"
Currently, the comments have been deleted to only 17, and the video has enabled selected comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Residents of Pucheng County posted pictures of people having their mouths covered on social media platforms, and some netizens said that they were even banned from posting the comment "111" in the relevant live broadcast room.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/LI4Y1wSZe3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a bus company in Jiutai District, Changchun, issued a notice to cancel free bus rides for the elderly because the government had not provided funding for three years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 7 (Release) The boss of Anhui Jiayu Company tagged the front-end employees in the work group in the middle of the night, saying that if the company suffered losses due to system problems and they did not respond after repeated contact, the employment contract would be terminated and a fine of 2,000 yuan would be imposed. 
The employees responded: Our monthly salary is only 5,000 yuan, but you asked us to be on call 24 hours a day, and the salary increase promised in one year was not fulfilled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Media reports: Self-media accounts "Chengdu Ahui Talks about Houses" and "Zhao Ge Talks about Houses" were summoned for talks by the Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau for publicly using adjectives such as "Chengdu Hegang", "money-losing", "no future", and "barren" in live broadcasts, which had a negative impact on the public opinion environment of the city's real estate market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6, Guangdong. A single mother held her child and cried in front of the camera: I really have no other options. I just called the Women's Federation for help. I hope they can help me find a job. Otherwise, I really can't survive. "How can I survive? I don't want to commit suicide with my son. I'm not willing to do that."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On New Year's Day 2025, Taiwan announced a number of measures to benefit the people: raising the minimum wage to NT$28,590 (about RMB 6,402.23), expanding the age range of free screening services for cancers such as cervical cancer and colorectal cancer, and expanding the distribution of cultural coins.
Chinese netizens expressed envy: "(Taiwan) is my home" "No wonder they don't want to return" "Beijing's minimum wage standard is RMB 2,420"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
UN human rights experts sent a letter to North Korea, asking for clarification on the news that two of the 11 North Korean defectors repatriated by China were sentenced to death and the remaining nine were sentenced to life imprisonment.
North Korea held a public trial in August last year and sentenced two women to death for allegedly trafficking North Korean defectors in China to South Korea, operating adult entertainment facilities, and participating in prostitution. The two were forcibly repatriated from China to North Korea in October 2023 and were executed on the same day of sentencing. The remaining nine people who were repatriated together were sentenced to life imprisonment for participating in human trafficking in China, and their whereabouts are currently unknown.
